attributes.text:
<script name="panelHilitegl" type="x-shader/x-fragment">
 precision mediump float;
 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;
 
 uniform sampler2D imgA;
 uniform sampler2D imgB;
 uniform float r;
 uniform float g;
 uniform float b;
 uniform float ff;
 uniform float nf;

void main(void) {
 vec4 hlt = vec4(r,g,b,1.);
 vec4 tx1 = texture2D(imgA,texCoord);
 vec4 tx2 = hlt * texture2D(imgB, texCoord);

 float dz = length(I);
 float cd = (ff > 0.) ? smoothstep( (ff * 2.), ff, dz) : 1. ;
 float od = smoothstep( (nf / 2.), nf, dz);
 float gz = clamp(cd * od, 0., 1.) ; 

 if (dotp < 0.) discard; else 
 gl_FragColor = gz* mix(tx1,tx2,tx2.a);
}
</script>
<script name="panelHilitegl" type="x-shader/x-vertex">
 attribute vec3 vertexPosition;
 attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord;

 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;

 uniform mat4 modelViewProjectionMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelViewMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelMatrix;
 uniform mat4 normalMatrix;
 void main() {
 vec4 vertexNormal=vec4(0.,0.,1.,0.);
 vec4 vp = vec4(vertexPosition, 1.0);
 gl_Position = modelViewProjectionMatrix * vp;
 texCoord = vertexTexCoord;
 vec3 vv = vec3(modelViewMatrix * vp);
 vec3 N = vec3(normalize(normalMatrix * vertexNormal));
 I = vv.xyz - vec3(0);
 dotp = dot(N,normalize(I));
 }
 </script>





<script name="panelHilite2gl" type="x-shader/x-fragment">
 precision mediump float;
 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;
 
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D;
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D1;
 uniform float r;
 uniform float g;
 uniform float b;
 uniform float ff;
 uniform float nf;

void main(void) {
 vec4 hlt = vec4(r,g,b,1.);
 vec4 tx1 = texture2D(texSampler2D,texCoord);
 vec4 tx2 = hlt * texture2D(texSampler2D1, texCoord);

 float dz = length(I);
 float cd = (ff > 0.) ? smoothstep( (ff * 2.), ff, dz) : 1. ;
 float od = smoothstep( (nf / 2.), nf, dz);
 float gz = clamp(cd * od, 0., 1.) ; 

 if (dotp < 0.) discard; else 
 gl_FragColor = mix(tx2,mix(tx1,tx2,tx2.a),gz);
}
</script>
<script name="panelHilite2gl" type="x-shader/x-vertex">
 attribute vec3 vertexPosition;
 attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord;

 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;

 uniform mat4 modelViewProjectionMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelViewMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelMatrix;
 uniform mat4 normalMatrix;
 void main() {
 vec4 vertexNormal=vec4(0.,0.,1.,0.);
 vec4 vp = vec4(vertexPosition, 1.0);
 gl_Position = modelViewProjectionMatrix * vp;
 texCoord = vertexTexCoord;
 vec3 vv = vec3(modelViewMatrix * vp);
 vec3 N = vec3(normalize(normalMatrix * vertexNormal));
 I = vv.xyz - vec3(0);
 dotp = dot(N,normalize(I));
 }
 </script>


<script name="panelHilite2bgl" type="x-shader/x-fragment">
 precision mediump float;
 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;
 
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D;
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D1;
 uniform float r;
 uniform float g;
 uniform float b;
 uniform float ff;
 uniform float nf;

void main(void) {
 vec4 hlt = vec4(r,g,b,1.);
 vec4 tx1 = texture2D(texSampler2D,texCoord);
 vec4 tx2 = texture2D(texSampler2D1, texCoord);

 vec4 rx2 = (tx2.r * hlt + vec4(1.)*tx2.b)*tx2.a;

 float dz = length(I);
 float cd = (ff > 0.) ? smoothstep( (ff * 2.), ff, dz) : 1. ;
 float od = smoothstep( (nf / 2.), nf, dz);
 float gz = clamp(cd * od, 0., 1.) ; 

 if (dotp < 0.) tx1 = mix(tx1,vec4(0.,0.,0.,tx1.a),-dotp); //discard; else 
 gl_FragColor = mix(rx2,mix(tx1,rx2,rx2.a),gz);
}
</script>
<script name="panelHilite2bgl" type="x-shader/x-vertex">
 attribute vec3 vertexPosition;
 attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord;

 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;

 uniform mat4 modelViewProjectionMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelViewMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelMatrix;
 uniform mat4 normalMatrix;
 void main() {
 vec4 vertexNormal=vec4(0.,0.,1.,0.);
 vec4 vp = vec4(vertexPosition, 1.0);
 gl_Position = modelViewProjectionMatrix * vp;
 texCoord = vertexTexCoord;
 vec3 vv = vec3(modelViewMatrix * vp);
 vec3 N = vec3(normalize(normalMatrix * vertexNormal));
 I = vv.xyz - vec3(0);
 dotp = dot(N,normalize(I));
 }
 </script>



<script name="panelHilite3gl" type="x-shader/x-fragment">
 precision mediump float;
 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;
 
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D;
 uniform sampler2D imgB;
 uniform sampler2D imgC;
 uniform float r;
 uniform float g;
 uniform float b;
 uniform float ff;
 uniform float nf;

void main(void) {
 vec4 hlt = vec4(r,g,b,1.);
 vec4 tx1 = texture2D(texSampler2D,texCoord);
 vec4 tx2 = hlt * texture2D(imgB, texCoord);
 vec4 tx3 = texture2D(imgC, texCoord);

 float dz = length(I);
 float cd = (ff > 0.) ? smoothstep( (ff * 2.), ff, dz) : 1. ;
 float od = smoothstep( (nf / 2.), nf, dz);
 float gz = clamp(cd * od, 0., 1.) ; 

 if (dotp < 0.) discard; else 
 gl_FragColor = mix(tx2,mix(mix(tx1,tx3,tx3.a),tx2,tx2.a),gz);
}
</script>
<script name="panelHilite3gl" type="x-shader/x-vertex">
 attribute vec3 vertexPosition;
 attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord;

 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;

 uniform mat4 modelViewProjectionMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelViewMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelMatrix;
 uniform mat4 normalMatrix;
 void main() {
 vec4 vertexNormal=vec4(0.,0.,1.,0.);
 vec4 vp = vec4(vertexPosition, 1.0);
 gl_Position = modelViewProjectionMatrix * vp;
 texCoord = vertexTexCoord;
 vec3 vv = vec3(modelViewMatrix * vp);
 vec3 N = vec3(normalize(normalMatrix * vertexNormal));
 I = vv.xyz - vec3(0);
 dotp = dot(N,normalize(I));
 }
 </script>

<script name="panelTrafficgl" type="x-shader/x-fragment">
 precision mediump float;
 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;
 
 uniform sampler2D imgA;
 uniform sampler2D imgB;
 uniform float state;
 uniform float ff;
 uniform float nf;
 uniform float tick;

void main(void) {
 vec4 tx1 = texture2D(imgA,texCoord);
 vec4 tx2 = texture2D(imgB,texCoord);
 float istate = state==0. ? 1.+floor(mod(tick*10.,3.)) : state;
 vec4 hlt = vec4(istate<=2.?1.:0.,istate>=2.?1.:0.,0.,tx2.a);

 vec4 rx2 = istate==1.? tx2.r * hlt : istate==2.?tx2.g*hlt : istate==3.? tx2.b * hlt : vec4(0.);

 float dz = length(I);
 float cd = (ff > 0.) ? smoothstep( (ff * 2.), ff, dz) : 1. ;
 float od = smoothstep( (nf / 2.), nf, dz);
 float gz = clamp(cd * od, 0., 1.) ; 

 if (dotp < 0.) discard; else 
 gl_FragColor = mix(rx2,mix(tx1,rx2,rx2.a),gz);
}
</script>
<script name="panelTrafficgl" type="x-shader/x-vertex">
 attribute vec3 vertexPosition;
 attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord;

 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;

 uniform mat4 modelViewProjectionMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelViewMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelMatrix;
 uniform mat4 normalMatrix;
 void main() {
 vec4 vertexNormal=vec4(0.,0.,1.,0.);
 vec4 vp = vec4(vertexPosition, 1.0);
 gl_Position = modelViewProjectionMatrix * vp;
 texCoord = vertexTexCoord;
 vec3 vv = vec3(modelViewMatrix * vp);
 vec3 N = vec3(normalize(normalMatrix * vertexNormal));
 I = vv.xyz - vec3(0);
 dotp = dot(N,normalize(I));
 }
 </script>

<script name="panelFlag1bgl" type="x-shader/x-fragment">
 precision mediump float;
 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;
 
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D;
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D1;
 uniform float r;
 uniform float g;
 uniform float b;
 uniform float ff;
 uniform float nf;
 uniform float tick;

void main(void) {
 vec4 hlt = vec4(r,g,b,1.);
const float PI=3.14159;
 vec2 wave = vec2(texCoord.x,texCoord.y+smoothstep(0.25,1.,texCoord.x)*0.09*sin(mod(texCoord.x*2.*PI+tick,2.*PI)));
 vec4 tx1 = texture2D(texSampler2D,wave);
 vec4 tx2 = texture2D(texSampler2D1, wave);

//vec4 rx1 = (tx1.r * hlt + vec4(1.)*tx1.b)*tx1.a;
vec4 rx1 = (tx1.r * hlt + vec4(tx1.b,tx1.b,tx1.b,1.))*tx1.a;
vec4 rx2 = (tx2.r * hlt + vec4(1.)*tx2.b)*tx2.a;

 float dz = length(I);
 float cd = (ff > 0.) ? smoothstep( (ff * 2.), ff, dz) : 1. ;
 float od = smoothstep( (nf / 2.), nf, dz);
 float gz = clamp(cd * od, 0., 1.) ; 

 if (dotp < 0.) discard; else 
 gl_FragColor = mix(rx2,mix(rx1,rx2,rx2.a),gz);
}
</script>
<script name="panelFlag1bgl" type="x-shader/x-vertex">
 attribute vec3 vertexPosition;
 attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord;

 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;

 uniform mat4 modelViewProjectionMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelViewMatrix;
 uniform mat4 modelMatrix;
 uniform mat4 normalMatrix;
 void main() {
 vec4 vertexNormal=vec4(0.,0.,1.,0.);
 vec4 vp = vec4(vertexPosition, 1.0);
 gl_Position = modelViewProjectionMatrix * vp;
 texCoord = vertexTexCoord;
 vec3 vv = vec3(modelViewMatrix * vp);
 vec3 N = vec3(normalize(normalMatrix * vertexNormal));
 I = vv.xyz - vec3(0);
 dotp = dot(N,normalize(I));
 }
 </script>

<script name="panelFlag2bgl" type="x-shader/x-fragment">
 precision mediump float;
 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;
 
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D;
 uniform sampler2D texSampler2D1;
 uniform float r;
 uniform float g;
 uniform float b;
 uniform float ff;
 uniform float nf;

void main(void) {
 vec4 hlt = vec4(r,g,b,1.);
 vec4 tx1 = texture2D(texSampler2D,texCoord);
 vec4 tx2 = texture2D(texSampler2D1, texCoord);

vec4 rx1 = (tx1.r * hlt + vec4(1.)*tx1.b)*tx1.a;
vec4 rx2 = (tx2.r * hlt + vec4(1.)*tx2.b)*tx2.a;

 float dz = length(I);
 float cd = (ff > 0.) ? smoothstep( (ff * 2.), ff, dz) : 1. ;
 float od = smoothstep( (nf / 2.), nf, dz);
 float gz = clamp(cd * od, 0., 1.) ; 

 if (dotp < 0.) discard; else 
 gl_FragColor = mix(rx2,mix(rx1,rx2,rx2.a),gz);
}
</script>

 attribute vec3 vertexPosition;
 attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord;

 varying vec2 texCoord;
 varying vec3 I;
 varying float dotp;

 uniform mat4 modelViewProjectionMatrix;

 texCoord = vertexTexCoord;
 vec3 vv = vec3(modelViewMatrix * vp);

 I = vv.xyz - vec3(0);
